title: How do I remove this
body:
OK so for some reason I don't know why, the black bar on the bottom of my screen won't disappear whenever I try to fool screen something, whether that be youtube or league or any other game it just won't go away. It is really distracting and if I ever accidentally click on it, it removes me from the game.
Does anyone know how to get rid of it?
https://s1.postimg.org/i23ct9le5/image.png

P.S. I tried going window mode yet the screen still goes below it and it even covers half the map.

replies.body: There could be another program interfering with League, but toggling it off could help too.  What happens if you right click the task bar, then select Hide Taskbar?

Thank you for the quick reply.
I currently have it on "hide taskbar" as a temp. solution since it is more lenient on the mistake of clicking of the screen but I can't get it to go away fully.
I don't really know what could be the thing that is causing it other than the fact that it suddenly appeared when i was clicking more than usual in a team fight.
Have you tried moving the taskbar to the right or left side of your screen and playing in windowed(would help if windowed mode doesn't reach all the way left-right across the screen)

Actually, that might work, since for some reason, lowering the resolution won't actually turn the screen smaller but just make it thinner, putting it to the side could help. 
I'll try it out thank you.
Hey the same thing happens to me sometimes. When I'm in boarderless, the taskbar doesn't go away. I don't see the "Hide Taskbar" option :c

Does your search windows button work?
If not, then it could be a problem with the program itself.
